name: framelayoutkit-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for FrameLayoutKit iOS framework - generates Swift UIKit code using FrameLayoutKit syntax

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Nam Kennic

tools.name: generate-framelayout
tools.description: Generate FrameLayoutKit code for iOS layouts

tools.name: convert-autolayout
tools.description: Convert Auto Layout code to FrameLayoutKit syntax

tools.name: validate-framelayout
tools.description: Validate FrameLayoutKit code for syntax and semantic correctness

tools.name: generate-migration-guide
tools.description: Generate a migration guide for converting projects to FrameLayoutKit

tools.name: generate-viewcontroller
tools.description: Generate complete view controller with FrameLayoutKit layouts
